citethispage-desc: Foeget in bysûndere side foar [[Special:CiteThisPage|sitearjen]] ta, en de ferwizing yn 'e arkbalke

''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|MHRA-styl]] === {{SITENAME}}-meidoggers, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [rieplachte {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Chicago-styl]] === {{SITENAME}}-meidoggers, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (rieplachte {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|CBE/CSE-styl]] === {{SITENAME}}-meidoggers. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Ynternet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [sitearre {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Beskikber op: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Bluebook-styl]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (lêst besocht {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[BibTeX]]-yngong === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; rieplachte {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } It neikommende kin de foarkar hawwe, at de pakket-URL fan [[LaTeX]] brûkt wurdt (\usepackage{url} earne yn de preämbule) wat oer it algemien webadressen mei in folle moaiere opmaak jout: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; rieplachte {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
